Comment: >Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi, meanwhile, said Monday on X the US and Iran will hold “indirect high-level” talks in Oman on Saturday.  This is a talk to see if there can be talks... what will it take to bring Iran to the table.  Having watched Trump deal with getting Russia to the table, expect the US to recognize the Houthis as a legitimate government and Iran to be offered US fighter jets before talks begin.
